body:
Hey guys! It's me, Carrie May~

I just recently heard that there's a huge decline with players coming to this server. I'm back to visit.
But I really want to help out in any other way. I can make youtube videos of us pvping. My channel is not yet popular
but it's gaining subscribers. I only have 17 so far. But yea, how's it going for everyone? How's your life?
If you're going to ask me how am I, I feel great. I met more new friends along the way from the community of Google plus just
by playing tf2! Anyway, this is all I can say and ask. Good day.

title: Need help with the server or anything?
